Bash(git merge develop --no-ff -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge branch ''develop'' into main

Merging navigation feature implementation from develop branch.

This merge brings in the complete navigation system with:
- Navigation Compose integration
- New feature-message module with MVI pattern
- App bars with titles on all screens
- Back navigation support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
